titleStmt.title: A brief account concerning several of the agents of New-England, their negotiation at the Court of England with some remarks on the new charter granted to the colony of Massachusets shewing that all things duely considered, greater priviledges than what are therein contained, could not at this time rationally be expected by the people there.
titleStmt.author: Mather, Increase, 1639-1723.

titleStmt.title: A brief account concerning several of the agents of New-England, their negotiation at the Court of England with some remarks on the new charter granted to the colony of Massachusets shewing that all things duely considered, greater priviledges than what are therein contained, could not at this time rationally be expected by the people there.
titleStmt.author: Mather, Increase, 1639-1723.

notesStmt.note: This item can be found at reels 794:31 and 1531:7.
Imperfect: print show-through; copy at reel 1531:7 is stained, with slight loss of print.
